vibesExplanation: The selected vibes are based on the workout's focus on foundational body-weight exercises suitable for beginners, aiming at weight loss and full-body engagement without equipment. The phrase 'beginner's workout' and the focus on simple, doable routines highlight the 'Foundation Builder' vibe, scoring 0.8 due to the methodical and basic nature of the workout, which makes it perfect for strengthening weak points and building basics. The routine also suggests a 'Reboot Workout' vibe with a score of 0.6, as it provides a total-body refresh through low-stress movements, especially with exercises like Baby Pose and Back Stretch aiming at relaxation post-exercise. Lastly, 'Comfort Moves' is also relevant here, albeit at a 0.4 score, as the workout offers a safe, accessible fitness option aligned with a cozy, feel-good movement focus—particularly suitable for those new to exercise. Although not highly challenging or intense, these align well as it targets steady weight loss and overall comfort in achieving personal fitness goals, as reflected in the comments from users striving for sustainable weight management.
